articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: West Africa warns of military action against Niger coup leaders | Mint - Mint
articles.description: At an emergency summit in Nigeria to discuss last week's coup, leaders of the Economic Community of West African States called for constitutional order to be restored, warning of reprisals if not.
articles.content: West African nations imposed sanctions and threatened force on Sunday if Niger's coup leaders fail to reinstate ousted President Mohammed Bazoum within a week, while supporters of the junta attacked … [+6581 chars]

articles.author: Boureima Balima, Felix Onuah
articles.title: West Africa threatens force on Niger coup leaders, French embassy attacked - Reuters
articles.description: West African nations imposed sanctions and threatened force on Sunday if Niger's coup leaders fail to reinstate ousted President Mohammed Bazoum within a week, while supporters of the junta attacked the French embassy in Niamey.
articles.content: NIAMEY/ABUJA, July 30 (Reuters) - West African nations imposed sanctions and threatened force on Sunday if Niger's coup leaders fail to reinstate ousted President Mohammed Bazoum within a week, while… [+5833 chars]

articles.title: Niger coup leader warns regional and Western powers against military intervention - BBC
articles.description: West African leaders set a seven-day deadline for the junta to reinstate the ousted president.
articles.content:
West African leaders have threatened military action against Niger's military junta after it took power in a coup last week
